title: UAAPS Package Lock File
description: Schema for package.agent.lock — pins exact resolved versions for reproducible installs. Auto-generated by the aam CLI; should be committed to VCS.

lockVersion.description: Lock file format version. Currently always 1.

resolved.description: Map of resolved package name → resolution entry.

systemChecks.description: Snapshot of system dependency versions recorded at install time.

python.description: Python version found at install time.

node.description: Node.js version found at install time.

binaries.description: Map of binary name → absolute path on $PATH.

pip.description: Map of pip package name → installed version.

npm.description: Map of npm package name → installed version.

integrity.description: SHA-256 hash of the package archive, prefixed with 'sha256-'.

dependencies.description: Direct dependencies of this resolved package and their pinned versions.
